title: The balcony may be allowed to be enclosed in the room, at the time of development permission, if desired by the owner / developer
clause_text: The balcony may be allowed to be enclosed in the room, at the time of development permission, if desired by the owner / developer. In such case depth of the enclosed balcony shall not exceed 1/3rd of the depth of the room. (including the depth of balcony) Nothing shall be allowed beyond the outer edge of balcony.

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
